snippet.title: Ghostanoid - Nintendo Switch Official Trailer - Coming on Jan 21, 2021
snippet.description:
Ghostanoid - a classic block breaker game invaded by ghosts - is coming to Nintendo Switch on Jan 21, 2021! Pre-orders (with 30% discount) are available on Dec 24, 2020!

Nintendo eShop page:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/ghostanoid-switch

3 diverse worlds, 78 levels (+3 secret ones), and 13 different improvers and worseners that sometimes turn the platform into a weapon of destruction or a clumsy snail. 
Use all of your strength, skill and speed of reaction to show the annoying ghosts who’s in charge of the house!
